briefTitle: Stroke Ready: A Stroke Preparedness Brief Intervention
officialTitle: Stroke Ready: A Stroke Preparedness Brief Intervention

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* over 18 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* none

primary.measure: Change in Behavioral Intent to Call 911
primary.description: Change in Behavioral intent to call 911 using a self-administered survey. The survey is the Stroke Action test which was modified based on community input. Scores range from 0-12 for stroke. A higher score means greater stroke behavioral intent to call 911 for a stroke while a low score means lower behavioral intent to call 911 for a stroke.
primary.timeFrame: Immediately (up to 10 minutes) before the brief intervention and then immediately (up to 10 minutes) after completing the brief intervention
